Name: Fire damper mechanically fixed to casing
Tag 1: fire damper is mechanically fixed to the casing with min 1 screw per side and min 200mm spacing betwwen screws

Name: Gaps between fire damper & wall no greater than 25mm
Tag 1: gaps between the fire damper and wall no greater than 25mm and is filled with killargo intumescent sealant with no cracking visible

Name: Killargo fire rated mastic applied to entire perimeter of fire damper cell
Tag 1: killargo fire rated mastic has been applied to entire perimeter of fire damper cell on both sides. no evidence of cracking.

Name: Casing perimeter sealed with Killargo intumescent sealant
Tag 1: casing perimeter is sealed with killargo intumescent sealant. no evidence of cracking.

Name: Sheet metal thickness is 0.7mm or greater
Tag 1: sheet metal thickness is 0.7mm or greater.

Name: Ductwork connected to either side of casing with nylon bolts on the flanges
Tag 1: ductwork is connected to either side of the casing with nylon bolts on the flanges as per the as1682.2 break away joint method. bolts do not exceed an 8mm diameter.

Tag 1: access panel is provided to conveniently access fire damper for visual and/or maintenance inspections.
